nodes.text: Heavy Naboo Cruisers were aquatic naval vessels used by the Royal Naboo Security Forces. They featured two cannons and possessed heavier armor. They are the upgraded versions of the Naboo Cruisers.
These vessels appear in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds and its 2003 expansion pack. They are only buildable by playing the Naboo civilization in multiplayer.
